name: Mini Jam 130 - Luna(r)tic!
description:
Story/Gameplay:

You and your crew are about to land on the moon.

Unfortunately there occured a critical malfunction in your engine,
and it is about to blow up in 10 seconds.

Can you safely land before that happens?

But don't panic; because when you touch the ground too hard, you'll explode too.

Pro tip: You can touch multiple checkpoints before the time runs out, to maximize points.

Controls:

UP: Accelerate (Main thruster) 

LEFT: Rotate left (Right thruster)

RIGHT: Rotet right (Left thruster)

ENTER: Restart (Explode lander)
